androidx.test.espresso.web.matcher

Class DomMatchers

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.test.espresso.web.matcher.DomMatchers

  • public final class DomMatchers
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of hamcrest matchers for objects in the org.w3c.dom package (such as Document and Element).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <any> containingTextInBody(java.lang.String text)
      Returns a matcher that matches Documents that have a body containing the given test.
      static <any> elementById(java.lang.String id, <any> elementMatcher)
      Matches Documents that have an Element with the given id that matches the given element matcher.
      static <any> elementByXPath(java.lang.String xpath, <any> elementMatcher)
      Matches a XPath and validates it against the first Element that it finds in the NodeList.
      static <any> hasElementWithId(java.lang.String id)
      Returns a matcher that matches Documents that have at least one element with the given id.
      static <any> hasElementWithXpath(java.lang.String xpath)
      Returns a matcher that matches Documents that have at least one element with the given xpath.
      static <any> withBody(<any> bodyMatcher)
      Returns a matcher that matches Documents with body that matches the given matcher.
      static <any> withTextContent(<any> textContentMatcher)
      Returns a matcher that matches Elements that have textContent matching the given matcher.
      static <any> withTextContent(java.lang.String textContent)
      Returns a matcher that matches Elements with the given textContent.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • withTextContent

        public static <any> withTextContent(java.lang.String textContent)
        Returns a matcher that matches Elements with the given textContent. Equivalent of withTextContent(is(textContent)).

      • withTextContent

        public static <any> withTextContent(<any> textContentMatcher)
        Returns a matcher that matches Elements that have textContent matching the given matcher.

Generated javadoc for the new package structure to make it clearer which packages are bundled with the Android operating system, and which are packaged with your app's APK. Going forward, the android.* package hierarchy will be reserved for Android packages that ship with the operating system; other packages will be issued in the new androidx.* package hiearchy.
